lead_paragraph: Asafa Powell of Jamaica, the world-record holder in the men’s 100 meters, has pulled out of next weekend’s 100 at the World Cup in Athens, his manager, Paul Doyle, said yesterday.
snippet: Asafa Powell of Jamaica, the world-record holder in the men’s 100 meters, has pulled out of next weekend’s 100 at the World Cup in Athens, his manager, Paul Doyle, said yesterday.
